rmi.rmi

Interface SiteItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteImpl

    public interface SiteItf
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface to build the data transfer mecanism between nodes

      • sendDataToSon

        void sendDataToSon(byte[] data)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to send data (a byte array) to sons of node. When the node receive the data, he will send it to each son. Also, he will prevent us the good reception of data.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send - a byte array
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
